accessory.name: Auto Defense
accessory.description: Allows the tank to raise shields and activate parachutes before the tanks main move.

accessory.name: Parachute
accessory.description: Deployed when the tank falls. Prevents the tank from taking falling damage. Parachutes must be enabled before they are effective.

accessory.name: Battery
accessory.description: Used to re-charge tank life. Giving more health and longer shots.

accessory.name: Fuel
accessory.description: Allows the tank to move. When it is the players turn the tank may choose to move rather than fire.

accessory.name: Nitro
accessory.description: Allows the tank to move at an accelerated rate.

accessory.name: Light Armor
accessory.description: Provides an extra 25 points of protection Capacity: 25 dmg | Collision Damage: 10 dmg

accessory.name: Heavy Armor
accessory.description: Provides an extra 50 points of protection Capacity: 50 dmg | Collision Damage: 10 dmg

accessory.name: Mirror Shield
accessory.description: Completely protects against damage from lasers but provides little protection from other damage. Capacity: 5 dmg | Collision Damage: 5 dmg

accessory.name: Shield
accessory.description: A small defensive shield that protects the tank from moderate amounts of damage. Capacity: 150 dmg | Collision Damage: 10 dmg

accessory.name: Heavy Shield
accessory.description: A large defensive shield that protects the tank from moderate amounts of damage. Capacity: 200 dmg | Collision Damage: 10 dmg

accessory.name: Ultra Shield
accessory.description: The best defensive shield that protects the tank from large amounts of physical damage. Capacity: 250 dmg | Collision Damage: 10 dmg

accessory.name: Force Shield
accessory.description: A small reflective shield that protects the tank from small amounts of physical damage. Force shields reflect any shots that hit them. Capacity: 100 dmg | Collision Damage: 15 dmg

accessory.name: Hv Frc Shield
accessory.description: A large reflective shield that protects the tank from moderate amounts of physical damage. Force shields reflect any shots that hit them. Capacity: 150 dmg | Collision Damage: 15 dmg

accessory.name: Mag Deflect
accessory.description: A small reflective shield that protects the tank from small amounts of damage. Mag shields reflect any shots that hit them but only from above. Capacity: 125 dmg | Collision Damage: Timed

accessory.name: Heavy Mag
accessory.description: A large reflective shield that protects the tank from large amounts of damage. Mag shields reflect any shots that hit them but only from above. Capacity: 200 dmg | Collision Damage: Timed

accessory.name: WeaponMuzzle
accessory.description: The muzzle flash for guns

accessory.name: Nuclear Plant
accessory.description: Nuclear power plants go into meltdown when destroyed, releasing a devestating explosion and radioactive fallout which travels downwind.

accessory.name: Tracer
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that causes no damage. Can be used to determine range without wasting other weapons. Leaves a marker at the final position.

accessory.name: Smoke Tracer
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that causes no damage. Can be used to determine range without wasting other weapons. Leaves a colored trace of the shot path.

accessory.name: X Tracer
accessory.description: Shoots a spread of tracers at 2.5 degree increments horizontally and vertically to help you correct your shot.

accessory.name: Baby Missile
accessory.description: A small explosive projectile weapon

accessory.name: Missile
accessory.description: A mid-size explosive projectile weapon

accessory.name: MOAB
accessory.description: The largest conventional explosive bomb. Doesn't generate as big of a crater as the nuclear bombs, but the air blast does some damage over a large area.

accessory.name: Baby Nuke
accessory.description: A small nuclear explosive projectile

accessory.name: Nuke
accessory.description: A large nuclear explosive projectile Does 133% collision damage to shields.

accessory.name: Fatman
accessory.description: A very large nuclear explosive projectile. Does 166% collision damage to shields.

accessory.name: Self Destruct
accessory.description: Detonate yourself causing a massive explosion

accessory.name: Tsar Bomba
accessory.description: The largest single nuclear explosion bomb ever constructed. Fallout does further damage to surrounding area. Does 200 percent collision damage to shields.

accessory.name: EMP Missile
accessory.description: A large missile with a special EMP warhead. The EMP does heavy shield damage and minor tank damage.

accessory.name: Shotgun
accessory.description: Shoots 6 pellets in a small spread. This weapon has a limited range. Guns are always shot at 1000 power.

accessory.name: M2 Machinegun
accessory.description: Shoots five 50 caliber bullets in rapid succession. Guns are always shot at 1000 power.

accessory.name: Sniper Rifle
accessory.description: A powerful rifle with armor piercing rounds. Bullet does double damage in shield collisions. Guns are always shot at 1000 power.

accessory.name: Frag Grenade
accessory.description: Tosses a grenade which bounces once and explodes creating some shrapnel

accessory.name: EMP Grenade
accessory.description: A grenade that bounces once then explodes and damages opponents without destroying the landscape. EMPs do more damage to shields than to tanks.

accessory.name: Gas Grenade
accessory.description: Grenade that releases a cloud of gas which damages opponents. The cloud does less damage as it spreads out.

accessory.name: Spread MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases several small warheads. These warheads fan out in a random direction.

accessory.name: MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases several small warheads. These warheads fan out in a straight line from the direction of the firer.

accessory.name: Mega MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases five medium sized warheads in a vertical line.

accessory.name: Mega S-MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases five medium sized warheads in a horizontal line.

accessory.name: Death's Head
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases many large warheads. These warheads fan out in a random direction.

accessory.name: Apocalypse
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases many medium sized nuclear warheads in different directions. Higher shot = more spread, lower = less spread

accessory.name: Dmsday Device
accessory.description: Detonates at the peak of the projectile's arc and rains massive destruction upon the field. Higher shot = more spread, lower = less spread

accessory.name: Strangelove
accessory.description: Fire it high into the air and watch the world as you know it come to an end. Higher shot = more spread, lower = less spread

accessory.name: Funky Bomb
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on exploding releases many small missiles. These missiles automatically target nearby tanks.

accessory.name: Hornet Nest
accessory.description: Creates an angry cloud of hornets which fly around attack nearby opponents twice

accessory.name: Hornet Swarm
accessory.description: Creates a multiple clouds of angry hornets which fly around attack nearby opponents twice

accessory.name: The Travolta
accessory.description: Light this far away from yourself.

accessory.name: Baby Napalm
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a river of flame. Any tanks near the flames will lose life.

accessory.name: Flame Thrower
accessory.description: Steady flowing napalm streams of flame. any tanks near the flames will lose life.

accessory.name: Napalm
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a river of flame. Any tanks near the flames will lose life.

accessory.name: Napalm MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point breaks into several napalm warheads.

accessory.name: Napalm S-MIRV
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point breaks into several napalm warheads which fan out in a random direction.

accessory.name: Fire Ants
accessory.description: A projectile weapon digs under the ground and explodes/burns on contact.

accessory.name: Napalm Blast
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that exploding releasing multiple blobs of napalm aimed at enemy tanks.

accessory.name: Hell Storm
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases many explosive napalm warheads.

accessory.name: Riot Bomb
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes removing a small amount of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to remove earth from under them.

accessory.name: Hvy Riot Bomb
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes removing a large amount of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to remove earth from under them.

accessory.name: Riot Blast
accessory.description: Riot Blasts are a larger version of the Riot Charge. The destroy a wider angle of dirt, and the thickness of the wedge destroyed is also greater.

accessory.name: Acid Blast
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that scatters several acid bomblets which eat the earth and burn targets.

accessory.name: Bottomless Pit
accessory.description: Creates a narrow, but very deep pit at the point of impact, from which no opponent can escape without teleporting.

accessory.name: Landscaper
accessory.description: Gigantic earth removing device. This weapon does no physical damage

accessory.name: Riot Drill
accessory.description: Shoots 3 heavy riot bombs in rapid succession

accessory.name: Acid Rain
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that on reaching its highest point releases many dirt eating warheads. This weapon does no physical damage.

accessory.name: Acid Splash
accessory.description: Explodes creating other smaller acid warheads that eat dirt and continue bouncing outward. It does no physical damage to tanks.

accessory.name: Baby Digger
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some small riot bombs.

accessory.name: Digger
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some riot bombs.

accessory.name: Quicksand
accessory.description: A projectile weapon digs under the ground eats away the surrounding earth.

accessory.name: Dirt Clod
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a small mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

accessory.name: Dirt Ball
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a medium mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

accessory.name: Ton Of Dirt
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes making a large mound of earth. The explosion does not harm tanks but can be used to cover them.

accessory.name: Wall Of Dirt
accessory.description: Raises a small wall Of Dirt a short distance from your tank in the direction you aim

accessory.name: Dirt Charge
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that throws many small dirt clods in all directions.

accessory.name: Small Meteor
accessory.description: A meteor that explodes on impact, scattering burning chunks of earth about the area.

accessory.name: Mega Meteor
accessory.description: A meteor that explodes on impact, scattering burning chunks of earth about the area.

accessory.name: Meteor Shower
accessory.description: Weapon creates a mass of flaming meteors at a random location in the sky. The meteors explode and scatter flaming earth on impact. YOU CANNOT AIM THIS WEAPON!

accessory.name: Volcano
accessory.description: Spawns a devestating volcano upon impact.

accessory.name: Earthquake
accessory.description: Shakes the earth and does damage over a large area. Earthquakes occur at a random location on the map YOU CANNOT AIM THIS WEAPON

accessory.name: Leap Frog
accessory.description: An explosive projectile weapon. When the warhead explodes it creates other small warheads that continue in the same direction as the original.

accessory.name: Bunny Bomb
accessory.description: MIRV that releases several leaping warheads.

accessory.name: Haymaker
accessory.description: MIRV that releases several leaping warheads which release even smaller explosive bomblets

accessory.name: Baby Roller
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a number of rolling bombs. These bombs roll downhill exploding on contact with any tank.

accessory.name: Roller
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes into a number of rolling bombs. These bombs roll downhill exploding on contact with any tank.

accessory.name: Baby Sandhog
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some small burrowing missiles. These missiles target nearby tanks.

accessory.name: Sandhog
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that explodes creating some burrowing missiles. These missiles target nearby tanks.

accessory.name: Lightning Strike
accessory.description: Two bolts of lightning streak down from the the sky. Unfortunately, mother nature is unpredictable in where she chooses to strike. YOU CANNOT AIM THIS WEAPON

accessory.name: Chain Lightning
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that courses through the ground aimed at nearby tanks

accessory.name: Shockwave
accessory.description: Projectile weapon that releases a massive energy wave that ripples outward horizontally

accessory.name: Lightning Storm
accessory.description: Multiple bolts of lightning streak down out of the sky. Unfortunately, mother nature is unpredictable in where she chooses to strike. YOU CANNOT AIM THIS WEAPON!

accessory.name: Fork Lightning
accessory.description: A projectile weapon that courses through the ground and splits into multiple streams that are aimed at nearby targets

accessory.name: Pen Laser
accessory.description: A tiny laser that does a small amount of damage, can be used to help aim lasers without wasting money.

accessory.name: Laser
accessory.description: Fires a laser that cuts through hills and shields damaging the tank directly. Note: More power = greater range but less damage Less power = less range but more damage Min Dmg = 25, Max Dmg = 50

accessory.name: Heavy Laser
accessory.description: Fires a powerful laser that cuts through hills and shields damaging the tank directly. Note: More power = greater range but less damage Less power = less range but more damage Min Dmg = 50, Max Dmg = 100

accessory.name: Laser Cannon
accessory.description: Fires three laser blasts that cut through hills and shields damaging tanks directly. Note: More power = greater range but less damage Less power = less range but more damage Min Dmg = 75, Max Dmg = 150

accessory.name: Sat. Strike
accessory.description: Fires a projectile which hits the ground, marking the target area. Space based laser cannons then assault all targets in the area.

accessory.name: Teleporter
accessory.description: A teleporter moves you to a random location on the map after a short delay.

accessory.name: Transporter
accessory.description: The transporter can be used to teleport yourself to any spot on the landscape.

accessory.name: Blink Device
accessory.description: Utilizes a prototype teleportation system which teleports the user almost instantly. The technology is still unstable though, sometimes causing the rift to collapse violently on one or both sides of the portal.

accessory.name: Gas Station
accessory.description: Gas stations have large tanks of fuel which explode and spread fire when ignited.

accessory.name: Factory
accessory.description: Factories work with deadly chemicals and release lethal clouds of gas when destroyed.

accessory.name: WeaponDeathAnimation
accessory.description: The tank explosion weapon
